TopicTitle: Craft icon disappeared in map view

Articles.Content:
So... I was launching a new station module, and I noticed that whenever I switched to map view, it focused on Kerbin by default. Tabbing to switch between object of focus does not list my craft, even if my craft is clearly in Kerbin orbit. All craft icon visibility menu on the upper screen is already turned on and my craft icon is still missing in map view (however, other existing craft has icon like normal, only currently controlled craft has no icon)

mod installed:

Stockalike stationparts extension redux (newest)

Kerbal Planetary Base System (newest)

Feline Utility Rover (newest)

Near future Electrical, Solar, Construction, Propulsion (newest)

Mechjeb (newest)

Solaris Hypernautic (obsolete, but it's not the cause, I already confirmed it)

can anyone help me?
